question: 支店
userExplanation: usually an office, not a store
sourceMnemonic:
The <kanji>support</kanji> <kanji>shop</kanji> is the <vocabulary>branch office</vocabulary>. Presumably this is because the regular "shop" is the "shop" and anything that supports it is the local (branch) office.

If it helps, this word has the same meaning as <ja>支局</ja> which you will also be learning in this level.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
